snippet: Jurors in the trial of Brig. Gen. Jeffrey A. Sinclair were sent back to their regular duties as lawyers tried to resolve the case.
abstract: Jurors in trial of Brig Gen Jeffrey A Sinclair are sent back to their regular duties as military officials and lawyers begin negotiations on plea agreement that would end sexual assault case against the general, who is accused of bullying junior officer into sex and threatening her life.

byline.original: By ALAN BLINDER and RICHARD A. OPPEL Jr
byline.contributor: Alan Blinder reported from Fort Bragg, and Richard A. Oppel Jr. from New York.

lead_paragraph: Jurors in the trial of Brig. Gen. Jeffrey A. Sinclair were sent back to their regular duties as lawyers tried to resolve the case.

headline.main: Plea Deal Talks Begin After Sexual Assault Trial Against Army General Is Halted
headline.print_headline: Plea Deal Talks Begin After Sexual Assault Trial Against Army General Is Halted

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
